expetiseMainContent.title: My Expertise
expetiseMainContent.desc: I've got chops in all phases of the development process.

expertiseCards.title: Strategy
expertiseCards.desc: I transform projects and ideas into well thought out design specs. After all, that's where the majority of amazing user experiences start.

expertiseCards.title: Code
expertiseCards.desc: I design in the browser with HTML(5), CSS(3) and a ES6. I love coding things from scratch, but I can work with Frontend frameworks like Vue.js, React.js, Bootstrap etc.

expertiseCards.title: Performance
expertiseCards.desc: Have you visited a website from an old smart phone under a slow network connection? And then, have you visited that website ever again..?

expertiseCards.title: UX/UI
expertiseCards.desc: I wireframe interfaces focusing on content structure, intuitive UI patterns and simple interactions. I'm a minimalist who truly believes that less is more.

expertiseCards.title: Creative
expertiseCards.desc: Backed by an extensive experience and a personality which demands to know the latest news in the business, I create a broad range of applications with a focus on web design.

expertiseCards.title: State-of-art
expertiseCards.desc: I build my projects using state of the art technologies, taking advantage of their benefits: faster, smarter, simpler and more flexible.
